title: 急急急！！！登录插件限制3人！！
author: kehebai
txt_content:
登录插件限制3人。进入登录插件修改成20人，可是修改完进入游戏又变3人。
求助！！！害得我服务器只能进3个人了~~~

replies.author: LZX6238
replies.txt_content:
换个登陆插件吧，删掉原来的吧，推荐AuthMe

{:10_492:}

replies.author: zx5124148
replies.txt_content: 不能换一个登录插件么，你用的是哪个登录插件？

replies.author: kehebai
replies.txt_content:
zx5124148 发表于 2014-6-16 22:25
不能换一个登录插件么，你用的是哪个登录插件？
Crazylogin

replies.author: zx5124148
replies.txt_content:
kehebai 发表于 2014-6-16 22:26
Crazylogin
用，AuthMe 稳定安全，还可以连接数据库

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: kehebai
replies.txt_content:
yr6965801 发表于 2014-6-16 22:29
我也是用的这个插件，没问题啊
你怎么设置的？？？

replies.author: yr6965801
replies.txt_content:
# CrazyLogin config.yml
# For more information visit
# https://github.com/ST-DDT/Crazy/ ... ogin/src/config.yml
version: '7.22'
chatHeader: '&C[&ACrazyLogin&C] &F'
database:
  FLAT:
    filePath: accounts.db
  saveType: FLAT
  saveOnShutdown: true
saveLoginLocations:
  DIM-19:
    x: 0.0
    y: 0.0
    z: 0.0
    yaw: 0.0
    pitch: 0.0
    world: DIM-19
  DIM1:
    x: 0.0
    y: 50.0
    z: 0.0
    yaw: 0.0
    pitch: 0.0
    world: DIM1
  DIM-1:
    x: 0.0
    y: 64.0
    z: 0.0
    yaw: 0.0
    pitch: 0.0
    world: DIM-1
  world:
    x: 64.0
    y: 112.0
    z: 320.0
    yaw: 0.0
    pitch: 0.0
    world: world
minPasswordLength: 3
protectedAccountMinPasswordLength: 7
alwaysNeedPassword: true
confirmNewPassword: false
confirmWithOldPassword: false
dynamicProtection: false
hideWarnings: false
autoLogout: 3600
autoKick: -1
autoTempBan: -1
autoKickUnregistered: -1
autoKickLoginFailer: 3
autoTempBanLoginFailer: -1
autoKickCommandUsers: -1
autoTempBanCommandUsers: -1
blockGuestCommands: true
blockGuestChat: false
blockGuestJoin: false
removeGuestData: false
disableRegistrations: false
disableAdminLogin: true
disableTokenLogin: true
doNotSpamAuthRequests: false
doNotSpamRegisterRequests: false
delayAuthRequests: 0
repeatAuthRequests: 200
commandWhitelist:
- /l(ogin)?(\z| .*)
- /register(\z| .*)
- /language(\z| [a-z]{2,3}_[a-z]{2,3})
- /language select(\z| .*)
- /language list(\z| .*)
- /worldedit cui
forceSingleSession: true
forceSingleSessionSameIPBypass: true
delayPreRegisterSecurity: 5
delayPreLoginSecurity: false
saveLoginEnabled: true
forceSaveLogin: false
hideInventory: false
hidePlayer: false
hideChat: false
delayJoinQuitMessages: false
useCustomJoinQuitMessages: true
hidePasswordsFromConsole: false
autoDelete: -1
maxStoredIPs: 5
maxOnlinesPerIP: 3
maxRegistrationsPerIP: 3
pluginCommunicationEnabled: false
moveRange: 5.0
filterNames: '[a-zA-Z0-9_]'
blockDifferentNameCases: false
minNameLength: 3
maxNameLength: 16
logs:
  AccessDenied:
    path: false
    console: false
  Account:
    path: false
    console: false
  ChatBlocked:
    path: false
    console: false
  CommandBlocked:
    path: false
    console: false
  Join:
    path: false
    console: false
  Login:
    path: false
    console: false
  LoginFail:
    path: false
    console: false
  Logout:
    path: false
    console: false
  Quit:
    path: false
    console: false
metrics:
  enabled: true
encryptor:
  name: CrazyCrypt1

replies.author: 紅月阿
replies.txt_content: 打开你的 Authme 然后进入 config 里面找到 MAXip 什么的 把 3 改为 你想注册上限
